solution_line_template: They see {people_per_hour_normal} people per hour and this number doubles during the holiday season so that's {people_per_hour_normal}*{doubling_factor} = <<{people_per_hour_normal}*{doubling_factor}={people_per_hour_holiday}>>{people_per_hour_holiday} people per hour

In an {hours_in_day} hour day, if {people_per_hour_holiday} people visit every hour then they will see {hours_in_day}*{people_per_hour_holiday} = <<{people_per_hour_holiday}*{hours_in_day}={total_customers_holiday}>>{total_customers_holiday} people in {hours_in_day} hours
